Package org.jdesktop.jdic.misc

Interface Summary
Wallpaper Sets the desktop back wallpaper.
 

Class Summary
Alerter This class sends alerts to the user when the application is not in the foreground.
DockMenu Displays a JMenu as a DockMenu, meaning the menu you get when you right click, control click, or press and hold on the application's Dock icon.
Volume Volume allows the developer to get, set, and watch the system volume.
WallpaperFactory This factory class can return a supported default Wallpaper implementations.
